headline: MSCI Prices $1.25 Billion 5.250% Senior Unsecured Notes Due 2035
summary: NEW YORK, August 05, 2025--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI), a leading provider of critical decision support tools and services for the global investment community, announced today that it priced its registered public offering of $1.25 billion aggregate principal amount of 5.250% senior unsecured notes due 2035 (the "notes") at an issue price of 99.417% (the "Offering"). Interest on the notes will be 5.250% per annum, and will be payable in cash semi-annually, beginning on March 1, 2026. Interest on the n

headline: MSCI Advances Private Markets Strategy With New Solutions Built for General Partners
summary: NEW YORK, August 05, 2025--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI) has launched two new data and analytics solutions, Private Asset and Deal Metrics and Real Capital Analytics (RCA) Funds, designed to provide General Partners (GPs) with deeper insights and enhanced investor engagement capabilities, enabling them to develop more effective strategies for capital formation and deployment across private asset and commercial real estate markets.

content.title: MSCI Advances Private Markets Strategy With New Solutions Built for General Partners
content.summary: NEW YORK, August 05, 2025--MSCI Inc. (NYSE: MSCI) has launched two new data and analytics solutions, Private Asset and Deal Metrics and Real Capital Analytics (RCA) Funds, designed to provide General Partners (GPs) with deeper insights and enhanced investor engagement capabilities, enabling them to develop more effective strategies for capital formation and deployment across private asset and commercial real estate markets.
